'''Fine Incense''' is a Quest Item obtained during the [[World Quest]] [[Hereafter: Return to the Mountains]]. It is used by offering it to the statue of [[Pervases]].

It can also be obtained after the quest by speaking to [[Starsnatcher|Wang Ping'an]], but only one may be owned at a time.
